headline.main: CALLS BANKHEAD BILL 'VICIOUS, DANGEROUS'; War Ad Council States Case Against U.S. Appropriations

lead_paragraph: No matter what the motives of their proponents, either the Bankhead Bill, recently passed by the Senate, or the related Cannon Bill, now before the House of Representatives, would be vicious and dangerous in its effects, the War Advertising Council asserted last night.
abstract: Sec Morgenthau and War Ad Council oppose govt ad bill
